EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Attending our Cloud $ecrets Webinar Series
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Thank you for attending our Cloud $ecrets Webinar Series webinar. Please feel free to watch the webinar on demand at your convenience! You can find the recording here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/videos/1380/]]>. If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or marketing@turbonomic.com. - The TurbonomicÂ Team
